body_html:
Still working on this; I've been exploring the TensorFlow core to see what I could pick up. I've added in the element-wise version of this Op and have been working at making broadcasting work.

I'm trying to use the functionality in core/util/bcast.h, but it's not quite there yet. I've been able to get the appropriate Tensor shape calculations, but I don't know how to convert the TensorBroadcastingOp back into a Eigen::TensorMap (or similar) so that I can actually access the values associated with the broadcasted Tensor. I've commented out my latest attempt on line 99 of substr_op.cc- is this close to how I should attempt this, or am I barking up the wrong tree?

I'll need to update the shape function to match the broadcast result, as well.

body:
Still working on this; I've been exploring the TensorFlow core to see what I could pick up. I've added in the element-wise version of this Op and have been working at making broadcasting work.

I'm trying to use the functionality in `core/util/bcast.h`, but it's not quite there yet. I've been able to get the appropriate Tensor shape calculations, but I don't know how to convert the `TensorBroadcastingOp` back into a `Eigen::TensorMap` (or similar) so that I can actually access the values associated with the broadcasted Tensor. I've commented out my latest attempt on [line 99 of substr_op.cc](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/4338/files#diff-8ce346dacb5764a51c596536a50de93eR99)\- is this close to how I should attempt this, or am I barking up the wrong tree?

I'll need to update the shape function to match the broadcast result, as well.
